products.title: Products
products.suite.name: Suite - Only Javascript-based Office Library
products.suite.desc1: The DHTMLX JavaScript UI library allows you to build cross-platform, cross-browser web and mobile apps faster. It includes a rich set of ready-to-use JavaScript UI components that can be easily combined into a single application interface or used separately.
products.suite.desc2: The DHTMLX UI components can be used with any server-side technology: PHP, Java, ASP.NET, Ruby, Grails, ColdFusion, Python, etc. To simplify client-server data communication, we offer special server-side connectors
products.slidejs.name: SlideJS - Only Javascript-based Powerpoint Viewer
products.slidejs.desc1: This is a Javascript library that allows you to browse Pptx & Pdf without a separate server by using a web browser.
products.docxjs.name: DocxJS - JavaScript Word Library
products.celljs.name: CellJS - JavaScript Excel Library
